column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Onto the ramen (we didn't order appetizers for lunch service).  I had the tonkotsu assari
column2: the bf had the spicy chicken ramen.  The ramen came out in about 10 minutes or so
column3: and both soups were perfection.  The tonkotsu assari had chewy
column7: a perfectly cooked/seasoned soft boiled egg
column8: and delicious pork chashu that fell apart with the touch of a chopstick.
